properties.description: Menaitech is a Human Resources Services company specializing in HR systems and solutions built on cloud technology; with 261 employees, $75M annual revenue, founded in 2003, and headquartered in Saudi Arabia, it operates in the SaaS industry providing cloud-based HR management software and solutions.
properties.content:
Employing innovative HR Solutions for your company's success

With an expert team, regional experience, and the latest technologies, Menaitech is your reliable partner for affordable, easy, and localized cloud-based HR software systems and solutions.

MenaAcademy

Explore Menaitech’s Academy! Gain skills and expertise in HR solutions and certifications and master our innovative solutions. We offer specialized training on Menaitech’s payroll and personnel management (MenaPAY) and talent management (Curio) systems, earning you industry-recognized certificates and a career boost.

Mudad Platform

MenaPay system integration with Mudad’s payroll platform allows Menaitech’s clients in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to comply with the Wage Protection System (WPS) and the General Organization for Social Insurance (GOSI) regulations.

Menaitech is now proudly ISO/IEC 27001:2022 certified!

Achieving International Recognition in Information Security and Data Protection.

A Sure Formula

Empowering HR, payroll, and talent management tools that will take your organization to excellence.

  • People

    Our solutions save time, effort, and resources, so happier, interactive employees have time for distinction.

  • Culture

    Aligned goals, streamlined workflow, real-time engagement, and intelligent talent development allow for a healthy work environment.

  • Success

    The result is a successful organization with elevated performance and expanding gains.

Nearly

0

Satisfied Clients

All you need to secure your success

Artificial
Intelligence

Video
CV

Big
Data

Talent
Acquisition

HR
Metrics

HR Portal

Talent
Onboarding

Augmented
Reality

Let us accompany you with our HR solutions from hire to retire, through an exceptional work experience for all.

## Your Business

Select the most suitable options that describe your business and needs and we will give you the best services for your business.

BlogCloudConnectivityInternetMPLS - Multiprotocol Label SwitchingNewsSD-WANSecurityTechnology PartnersTelecom partnersUncategorizedVPN - Virtual Private Network
Suggest solutions

## About Us

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20681'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2092%2092'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## Our solutions

- Connectivity
- Cloud
- Cyber Security

Connectivity is the skeleton of all IT services in an organization. Sahara provides your organization with state-of-the-art technologies and services. It also provides excellent 24×7 after sales support that you can depend on.

Don’t forget to ask for our high availability services that guarantee the highest levels of uptime, so your business continues to function no matter what.

[Learn More](https://sahara.com/connectivity/)

Join the Largest Cloud Platform in Saudi Arabia

Sahara Net has been providing hosting and cloud services since 1998. Today, our cloud offerings are the most popular in Saudi Arabia as we have the largest customer base. We provide 24×7 customer care in your language with fast response on our toll-free number.

We are proud that we are the provider of choice, go ahead and explore why!

[Learn More](https://sahara.com/cloud/)

With the high dependence today on technology everywhere, the security of information, transactions and infrastructure becomes highly critical more than ever before. Sahara Net provides an easy path for organizations to get secured. We partner with the world’s leading organizations and bundle these products with our managed services to give you total peace of mind.

[Learn More](https://sahara.com/security/)

company.name: Sahara Net
company.about: ICT company based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia, specializing in hosting and cloud services; approximately 228 employees as of 2025; operates in the SaaS industry with flexible cloud subscription offerings.

evaluations.reasoning: Sahara Net’s employee count is reported as 228 in September 2025 (search result 5) and 228 in a separate employee directory (search result 7), both of which fall within the 201‑500 range. A separate search result (search result 1) also lists the company as having 201‑500 employees as of July 2025. Although the internal company profile lists 140 employees, it also indicates a 201‑500 employee range, suggesting a formatting inconsistency. The most recent and authoritative data from 2025 confirm the company’s headcount is within the required range.

What is the history of Sahara Net?
History. Sahara Net is a Saudi Joint Stock Company (JSC) and its history goes back to 1989 when Sahara Net established the 1st Saudi Bulletin Board Service (BBS) in the Kingdom. During this period, it operated as a hub for email exchange in the FidoNet network.

properties.description: gulfHR is a SaaS provider of cloud-based HR management and payroll software, with 201-500 employees; headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia; offers real-time HR functions and industry-standard human capital administration.
properties.content:
[Skip to main content](https://www.gulfhr.com/#ajax-content-wrap)

[Close Search](https://www.gulfhr.com/)

## Powerful _human resource_ and payroll management system

#### **gulfHR** has at its core a robust processing engine. You work smarter, while all HR functions connect instantly with real-time information sharing.

[Getstarted](https://www.gulfhr.com/#features)

[View Services](https://www.gulfhr.com/gulfhr-services/)

![](https://www.gulfhr.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/0111.png)

![](https://www.gulfhr.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/0222.png)

## Intuitive, time saving & user friendly.

gulfHR's Human Resource Management System (HRMS) and payroll software is the key component to managing your organisations’ most valuable resource.

### Cloud Human Resources

Best practices and industry standard human capital administration SaaS wherever you go.

### HR analytics and metrics

Embed anaylitcs on a dashboard to provide a sound basis for decision making with an easily managed UI.

### Time and attendance

Manage employee attendance and productivity, while integrating with payroll and leave management functions.

### Value added services

Consulting, training, web and application developments and other value-added solutions to optimize human resource management.

### Integration with other applications

Known expertise in biometrics, time tracking and finance integration.

### Arabic interface

Fully Arabic enabled, empowering local and regional businesses even more.

#### Clients may start with our comprehensive system (all modules) or start with our core system and expand at a later stage in accordance with budget and functionality requirements.

#### Core system typically include Payroll and Leave Management, HR Administration, Report Writing, Document Management and Security modules and are often combined with Employee Self-Service and Time Management.

#### Modules such as Performance Management, Learning & Development and Recruitment or any combination thereof are then added at a later stage.

### Demanding environments?  No problem.

No matter how complex your environment is, gulfHR will deliver while being simple for users.

Exceptional client training and support, with customisations and technical backup readily available.

Tailor made HR and Payroll software for Dubai, UAE, Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Qatar, Oman, Iraq, Egypt, Pakistan, Jordan, Libya, Algeria and more…

In addition to these countries we are also able to customize our software for use in many other countries including (but not limited to) Iraq, Afghanistan, and Sri Lanka.

![Demanding environments? No problem.](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20430%20436'/%3E)

### The power of automation and interactivity.

Simple and intuitive HR processes. Line Managers and Employees take ownership of relevant HR tasks.

Complete Human Resource Management System (HRMS) developed by Gulf Solutions Group, one of the most reputable software companies in the Middle East and African region.

![The power of automation and interactivity.](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20500%20346'/%3E)

### Made in the Middle East, for the Middle East and well beyond.

Implemented in the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, Oman, Jordan, Egypt, Libya, Algeria and Pakistan.

**_The gulfHR system can also be deployed with an Arabic interface._**

### Simple. Scalable. Flexible. Friendly. Affordable.

Powerful security module allows superuser to define selective access for users and the data they require, in ‘real time’ and from any location.

![Simple. Scalable. Flexible. Friendly. Affordable.](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20470%20396'/%3E)

### Employee Self-Service Portal

Employees participate in the process online, accessing their own information with an extensive ‘employee self-service’ module.

## Helping our customers on every channel:

## Choose your deployment platform

- ### [On Cloud](https://www.gulfhr.com/\#tab_6670c019261e5)

[No capital cost](https://www.gulfhr.com/#tab_6670c019261e5)

- ### [Hosted](https://www.gulfhr.com/\#tab_6670c019261f8)

[Accessibility](https://www.gulfhr.com/#tab_6670c019261f8)

- ### [On Premise](https://www.gulfhr.com/\#tab_6670c01926206)

[Control over systems and data](https://www.gulfhr.com/#tab_6670c01926206)

- ### [Outsourced](https://www.gulfhr.com/\#tab_6670c01926212)

[Scalable and modular pricing](https://www.gulfhr.com/#tab_6670c01926212)


### An affordable monthly fee:

On-Cloud is a progressive software deployment approach where the application software for human resource management is hosted on the Cloud and clients use a web browser to access the application. This ensures that clients can setup their own application almost immediately and benefit from a secure and scalable architecture without having to go through complex and time consuming software and hardware installations. Cloud ensures that clients benefit product enhancements with no downtime.

### Increased Scalability and Speed:

Since companies no longer have to invest time in buying and setting up hardware and software, they can seamlessly scale up or down depending on their usage of services on the cloud.

### Use your web browser to access the application

With the Hosted option **gulfHR** offers managed server hosting. **gulfHR** offers dedicated and virtual servers, managed by reputed 3rd party providers in the UK and KSA. Servers run on a secure SSL encrypted server platform, disaster recovery procedures, 24×7 on-site technicians and high physical security.

![Hosted](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20566%20300'/%3E)

### Ideal for sensitive business data

The tried and tested traditional approach to software deployment and management. **gulfHR** is installed and operated from a client’s in-house server and computing infrastructure, utilizing an organization’s native computing resources and requires only a licensed copy of **gulfHR**.

![On Premise](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20531%20333'/%3E)

### Only pay for the headcount and services you need.

**gulHR’s** trusted HRMS solution, combined with regional expertise, now brings you HR Administration and payroll outsourcing for the Middle East region. Whether you are a bespoke small company with special payrolling requirements, or a larger SME seeking confidentiality, accuracy and timeliness, **gulfHR** had proven themselves to be a reliable business partner. **gulfHR’s** strength in payrolling lies in the controls and governance that is put in place.

![Outsourced](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20880%20490'/%3E)

## Time to Implement

#### The powerful gulfHR data upload facility facilitates quick and easy HRMS implementation.

- Data is uploaded in bulk via excel spreadsheet
- With co-operation of the client, the parallel payroll is normally produced at the end of the first month
- Live payroll is possible at the end of month two
- Integrated time & attendance payroll is possible from month three onwards.

[BookaFreeDemo](https://www.gulfhr.com/gulfhr-contact/)

How many HR for 500 employees?
Medium businesses (100–500 employees): Average between 1.5–2.5 HR staff per 100 employees. Large businesses (500+ employees): Often drop to 1.0 HR staff per 100 employees, thanks to tech and economies of scale.

references.title: 1.4 in 100. Is that your magic number? - LinkedIn
references.snippet:
Should there be 1.4 HR staff for every 100 employees?
There should be 1.4 HR staff for every 100 employees. Many companies have too many people in their HR department, as the average HR-to-staff ratio is 2.57. The average ratio goes up to 3.4 for small organizations, then down to 1.22 and 1.03 for medium and large organizations, respectively.

references.title: Saudi Arabia Payroll & Employer of Record: A Complete guide - Neeyamo
references.snippet:
What is the payroll process in Saudi Arabia?
In Saudi Arabia, the payroll frequency is weekly or monthly. The employer must make the payment for weekly employees once a week and make payments for monthly paid employees at least once a month. 13th-month payments are not mandatory. However, employers can pay performance-based bonuses at their discretion.
